import React from 'react' import { useLocation, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useCart } from '../cartContext' const ShoppingCartSection = () => { const location = useLocation(); const { cart } = useCart(); const isKhmer = location.pathname.startsWith('/kh'); const currentLanguage = location.pathname.split('/')[1] || 'en'; const subtotal = cart.reduce((total, product) => total + product.price, 0); return (
{/* */}
{cart.map((product, index) => ( ))}
{isKhmer ? 'ផលិតផល' : 'Product'} {isKhmer ? 'បរិមាណ' : 'Quantity'} {isKhmer ? 'សរុប' : 'Total'}
${product.price} removeFromCart(product.id)} style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: 'red' }} >
{isKhmer ? 'ទិញទំនិញបន្ដ' : 'Continue Shopping'}
{isKhmer ? 'ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពនៃកន្រ្ដក' : 'Update Cart'}
{isKhmer ? 'កូដបញ្ចុះតម្លៃ' : 'Discount codes'}
{isKhmer ? 'ចំណាយលើកន្រ្ដកសរុប' : 'Cart total'}
  • {isKhmer ? 'ចំណាយសរុប' : 'Subtotal'} ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
  • {isKhmer ? 'សរុប' : 'Total'} ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
{isKhmer ? 'ដំណើរការនៃការគិតលុយ' : 'Proceed to checkout'}
{/* */}
) } export default ShoppingCartSection
